NAME, t.uri, t.method, m.title AS menu_id, FROM auth_base_resource_authority ra INNER JOIN auth_base_element t ON ra.resource_id = t.auth_element_id AND ra.authority_id IN ( SELECT group_id FROM auth_base_group_member WHERE user_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT group_id FROM auth_base_group_leader WHERE user_id = #{userId} ) AND ra.authority_type = 'group' AND ra.resource_type = 'button' INNER JOIN auth_base_menu m ON t.menu_id = m.auth_menu_id
